archimate:Location.name: Administrator Portal Access
archimate:Location.documentation: Additionally there are 900+ Administrator staff who are able to access the following data through a centralised portal – • Met Office and Flood Forecasting Centre forecasts, alerts and warnings • Forecasts produced by the current system itself • Comments from forecasting duty officers on forecast quality • Flood guidance statements • Regional forecast outlook statements • Standard and custom tide tables • Soil moisture deficit data (MORECS) • Archived products such as catchment average data
